name: Endocytosis
description:
Endocytosis

Controls: Arrow Keys (or WASD), R to reset level

Hints:

  • Reunite all the slimes that aren't poisonous
  • Avoid Poison (Purple) Slimes
  • Water (Blue) Slimes and put out fires
  • Fire (Orange) Slimes can light fires

Lore: tbd

Credits:

Developed by 3E

Big thanks to Family & Friends

Music and sounds made by team. Graphics were mostly from asset packs.

Additional Assets used:

CanariPack 1BIT TopDown https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown

EggBit Dungeon Tileset https://crowbarska.itch.io/eggbit-dungeon-tileset

Pixel Tandysoft Font

Tools Used:

Game Engine - Godot 3.2.3

Graphics - Aseprite

Music - Milky Tracker

Sound Effects - PDFX
